Package org.svvrl.goal.core.aut

Class AbstractRandomAutomaton<T extends Automaton>

java.lang.Object
org.svvrl.goal.core.AbstractGenerator<T>
org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.AbstractRandomAutomaton<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of generated automata
All Implemented Interfaces:
Generator<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
RandomAutomaton, RandomHierarchicalAutomaton, RandomSDBW
public abstract class AbstractRandomAutomaton<T extends Automaton>
extends AbstractGenerator<T>
This is a generator of random automata.
Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai

    • genTransitionsByProbability

      protected void genTransitionsByProbability​(T aut, State[] states, java.lang.String[] alphabet, double pt, double ps)
      Generates transitions by probabilities.
      Parameters:
      aut - an automaton
      states - the states with transitions to be generated
      alphabet - the alphabet
      pt - the probability of having transitions between two states or not
      ps - the probability of having symbols on transitions between two states

    • genTransitionsByDensity

      protected void genTransitionsByDensity​(T aut, State[] states, java.lang.String[] alphabet, double dt) throws GenerationException
      Generates transitions by a transition density.
      Parameters:
      aut - the automaton to be generated
      states - the states with transitions to be generated
      alphabet - the alphabet
      dt - the desired transition density
      Throws:
      GenerationException - if the transition density cannot be satisfied

    • genAcceptanceConditionByProbability

      protected Acc<?> genAcceptanceConditionByProbability​(T aut, GraphicComponent[] comps, AcceptanceCondition type, double pa, int acc_sets) throws GenerationException
      Generates the acceptance condition by probability.
      Parameters:
      aut - the automaton to be generated
      comps - or transitions taken into account
      type - the type of the acceptance condition
      pa - the probability of a state being in the acceptance condition
      acc_sets - the number of acceptance sets in the acceptance condition
      Returns:
      an acceptance condition
      Throws:
      GenerationException - if the acceptance condition is not supported

    • genAcceptanceConditionByDensity

      protected Acc<?> genAcceptanceConditionByDensity​(T aut, GraphicComponent[] comps, AcceptanceCondition type, double da, int acc_sets) throws GenerationException
      Generates the acceptance condition by density.
      Parameters:
      aut - the automaton to be generated
      comps - states or transitions taken into account
      type - the type of the acceptance condition
      da - the probability of a state being in the acceptance condition
      acc_sets - the number of acceptance sets in the acceptance condition
      Returns:
      an acceptance condition
      Throws:
      GenerationException - if the acceptance condition is not supported or the maximal number of retries is reached
